lore.origin: Crafted from a branch of Yggdrasil that fell during the Great mystical Convergence, this staff was created by the combined efforts of masters from all six divine traditions working in unprecedented harmony.
lore.creation_story: Legend tells that when Yggdrasil wept during the convergence, its tears crystallized into six perfect orbs, each containing the essence of one divine tradition. These were mounted on a staff carved from the tree's own heartwood.
lore.historical_significance: Only three such staves have ever been created. One was lost in the Sundered Realms, one rests in the vault of the Neutral Halls, and this is the third.
lore.mystical_properties: The staff serves as a perfect conduit for mystical energies because it contains a piece of Yggdrasil itself - the cosmic tree that connects all realms and maintains the balance between divine forces.
lore.prophecy: Ancient texts speak of a time when the three convergence staves will be reunited to face a threat that could shatter the cosmic balance itself.

gameplay_notes.intended_use: Ultimate endgame weapon for players pursuing multi-tradition mystical mastery
gameplay_notes.balance_considerations: Extremely powerful but requires significant investment in learning multiple divine traditions
gameplay_notes.skill_requirements: Players need deep understanding of mystical mechanics to use effectively
gameplay_notes.group_role: Enables unique support roles by providing access to all divine tradition benefits
